original_text: To make a difference between the unclean and the clean, and between the beast that may be eaten and the beast that may not be eaten.
korean_text: 부정하고 정한 것과 먹을 생물과 먹지 못할 생물을 분별한 것이니라

sentences.original_text: To make a difference between the unclean and the clean
sentences.korean_translation: 부정한 것과 정한 것 사이에 차이를 두기 위해

sentences.original_text: and between the beast that may be eaten
and the beast that may not be eaten
sentences.korean_translation: 먹을 수 없는 짐승 사이에 차이를 두라
